title: Women's Hormone Balance Supplement | Natural Estrogen Support with Dong Quai, Maca, Ashwagandha & Ginseng | Menopause Relief, Libido & Vitality Support - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Women's Hormone Balance - Natural Estrogen Support

Restore hormonal harmony with our Women's Hormone Balance Supplement, a comprehensive formula designed to support healthy estrogen levels, ease menopause symptoms, enhance vitality, and promote overall women's wellness. Our powerful blend of traditional herbs and nutrients works synergistically to support hormonal balance naturally.

Key Benefits

  • Hormonal Balance: Supports healthy estrogen levels and overall hormone equilibrium
  • Menopause Relief: Helps ease hot flashes, night sweats, and mood swings
  • Enhanced Libido: Epimedium and Maca support healthy sexual desire and function
  • Energy & Vitality: Combats fatigue and supports sustained energy levels
  • Mood Support: Ashwagandha and Ginseng promote emotional balance and stress resilience
  • Reproductive Health: Dong Quai supports female reproductive system wellness
  • Cognitive Function: Ginkgo supports mental clarity and focus
  • Overall Wellness: Comprehensive support for women's health at any age

Powerful Herbal & Nutrient Blend

  • Epimedium (Horny Goat Weed): Traditional herb for libido and hormonal support
  • Dong Quai: "Female ginseng" used for centuries to support women's hormonal health
  • Maca Root: Peruvian superfood that supports energy, hormones, and libido
  • Ashwagandha: Adaptogen that supports stress resilience and hormonal balance
  • Asian Ginseng: Enhances energy, vitality, and overall wellness
  • Ginkgo Biloba: Supports circulation and cognitive function
  • Tribulus Terrestris: Supports hormonal balance and vitality
  • L-Arginine: Amino acid that supports circulation and sexual health
  • Damiana: Traditional herb for mood and libido support
  • Catuaba: Brazilian herb that supports energy and vitality
  • BioPerine®: Enhances absorption of nutrients
  • Essential Vitamins & Minerals: B-vitamins and zinc support hormonal health and energy

Perfect For

  • Perimenopause and menopause symptoms
  • Hormonal imbalances
  • Low energy and fatigue
  • Decreased libido
  • Mood swings and irritability
  • Overall women's wellness support

Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules daily with meals or as directed by your healthcare provider.

Quality Assurance: Natural herbal formula. Vegetarian capsules. No artificial additives.
shortDescriptionHtml: Support hormonal balance naturally with our Women's Hormone Balance Supplement. Powerful blend with Dong Quai, Maca, Ashwagandha, Ginseng, and Epimedium supports menopause relief, libido, energy, and overall vitality. 60 capsules.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Serving Per Bottle: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Vitamin A (as Beta-Carotene) 50 mcg RAE 6%
Thiamin (as Thiamin Mononitrate) 1.25 mg 104%
Niacin (as Niacin) 1 mg NE 6%
Vitamin B6 (as Pyridoxine HCl) 3.8 mg 224%
Vitamin B12 (as Cyanocobalamin) 54 mcg 2,250%
Pantothenic Acid (as D-Calcium Pantothenate) 2.5 mg 50%
Zinc (as Zinc oxide) 26 mg 236%
L-Arginine (Base) 100 mg †
BioPerine® (Black pepper Extract) (Piper nigrum) (Fruit) †
Proprietary Blend 802 mg †
Epimedium Powder (Epimedium sagittatum) (aerial), Tribulus Extract (Tribulus terrestris L.) (fruit), Catuaba Powder (Trichilia catigua) (bark), Dong Quai (Angelica sinensis) (root), Ginkgo (Ginkgo biloba) (leaf), Asian Ginseng (Panax ginseng) (root), Damiana Powder (Turnera diffusa) (leaf), Ashwagandha Extract (Withania somnifera) (root), Ginger (Zingiber officinale) (root), Maca (Lepidium meyenii) (root), Muira Puama (Ptychopetalum olacoides) (root), L-Phenylalanine, Asparagus Extract (Asparagus officinalis) (stem), Chinese Smilax (Smilax china) (root)

† Daily Value (DV) not established.

Other Ingredients: Rice Flour, Hypromellose (vegetable capsule), Magnesium Stearate (vegetable), Silicon Dioxide.
